summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 VOLKSWAGEN PASSAT. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V078000 (AIR BAGS). THE PART TO DO THE REPAIR WAS UNAVAILABLE.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE CONTACT SPOKE TO HALLMARK VOLKSWAGEN AT COOL SPRINGS (620 BAKERS BRIDGE AVE, FRANKLIN, TN 37067) AND THE MANUFACTURER WHO STATED THAT "IT WAS UP TO THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT" AND THEY COULD NOT ASSIST. THE MANUFACTURER ALSO STATED THAT PARTS WOULD POSSIBLY BE AVAILABLE IN SEPTEMBER. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
